thread.title: Perak Immigration director, three others arrested for alleged graft - Nation | The Star Online
thread.title_full: Perak Immigration director, three others arrested for alleged graft - Nation | The Star Online

author: Ivan Loh
title: Perak Immigration director, three others arrested for alleged graft - Nation | The Star Online
text:
Thursday, 23 February 2017 | MYT 12:46 PM Perak Immigration director, three others arrested for alleged graft by ivan loh The men, clad in orange MACC lock-up t-shirts were brought to the magistrate's court here Thursday for remand proceedings before Magistrate Siti Hanum Mohmad Sah. 
IPOH: Four men, including a Perak Immigration Department director, have been arrested by the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC), for alleged bribery. 
All four men, including the 57-year-old director, were arrested between midnight and 5.30am on Thursday at several locations in the state. 
The three others are two businessmen, both aged 30, and a 26-year-old mechanic. 
The men, clad in orange MACC lock-up t-shirts, were brought to the magistrate's court here Thursday for remand proceedings before Magistrate Siti Hanum Mohmad Sah. 
The four have been remanded for five days to allow investigations. 
Perak MACC director Datuk Nooraziah Abd Manaf confirmed the matter but declined to elaborate further.
